title: Playful Teaser
content:
Hey beautiful,

I was just thinking about you and couldn't help but smile. Do you know what you're doing to me? I can't stop thinking about our last conversation and how my heart raced when you laughed.

[PERSONAL MESSAGE]

Can't wait to hear from you,
[YOUR NAME]

title: Sweet Flirt
content:
Hi gorgeous,

Just a little note to remind you that you've been on my mind today. I love the way you make ordinary moments feel extraordinary.

[PERSONAL MESSAGE]

Thinking of you,
[YOUR NAME]
